name: Elementally
description:
Elementally is a short puzzle game made for GMTK 2021. Combine the elements to get the flag!

Controls:

- Z to validate (in menu) and wait (in puzzle)

- C to switch elementals (level 6 only)

- P to access the menu

Free PICO-8 music by Robby Duguay. Thanks to the beta testers!
